text: August Blaha (1 January 1888 - 25 September 1961) was an Austrian footballer. He played for SK Rapid Wien. There he was part of the team which won the first Austrian championship. He played at the1912 Summer Olympics in Stockholm for the Austrian football team. ==Honours== *3x Austrian football champion: 1911/12, 1912/13, 1916/17 ==Other websites== Rapid Archiv: August Blaha Category:1888 births Category:1961 deaths Category:Association football forwards Category:Austrian footballers Category:SK Rapid Wien players Category:Players of the Austrian national football team Category:Austrian football forwards Category:Austrian football champions
title: August Blaha
